mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Kendall, Andrew J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Kendall, Andrew J. Patient Age: 34. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of left forearm wrist and hand shattering the bone. [?] extensively laceration of the soft parts. Contusion of left thigh at external aspect at the middle with [illegible] the external aspect of the leg. Location Wounded: In action at Cedar Creek, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/10/19. Nature of Wound: Piece of shell. Result: Transferred to US Genl Hospital Cincinnati 1864/12/06.
